package.name: Solar
package.summary: Simple object library and application repository for PHP.
package.description:
Solar is a class library and application component suite for PHP 5 (and is PHP5 E_STRICT compliant). Solar provides simple, easy-to-comprehend classes and components for the common aspects of web-based rapid application development.
Solar is designed for developers who intend to distribute their applications to the whole world. This means, for example, the database driver functions work exactly the same way for each supported database. It also means that localization support is built in from the start.
Please visit http://solarphp.com/ for more information.

release.notes:
* Packaging script now properly keeps Solar/App/Public in the main library directory (instead of in the data directory)
* Solar_View
* Added new olar_View_Exception class, which means all Solar_View::_exception() calls return that instead of a generic Solar_Exception
* Solar_View_Helper_Form now uses a 'text' element when an unrecognized element type is requested
* Solar_Form_Load_Table
* Bugfix: now validates timestamp columns with Solar_Valid::isoTimestamp() instead of obsolete isoDateTime()
* Solar_Controller_Page
* $this->_forward() now sets $this->_view properly (previously, was not replacing dashes with slashed) ... reported by Jeff Surgeson.
* Solar_Sql_Table
* Updated _autoValid() error reporting codes to use VALID_* codes and translations (vice ERR_DATA_* codes)
* Solar/Locale
* Renamed obsolete "VALID_ISODATETIME" to "VALID_ISOTIMESTAMP".
* Solar_App_Bookmarks
* edit.action.php now reports database level feedback messages
* Solar_Sql_Table
* added new Solar_Sql_Table_Exception class, which means all Solar_Sql_Table::_exception() calls return that instead of a generic Solar_Exception
